metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2847 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
fs/pipe.c in the Linux kernel before 4.5 does not limit the amount ofunread data in pipes, which allows local users to cause a denial of service(memory consumption) by creating many pipes with non-default sizes.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2847` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
